entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 2200 metres. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border overnight. Snow level 2200 metres. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
